Package viewpackage.staffviewpackage

Class StaffCinema

java.lang.Object
viewpackage.View
viewpackage.staffviewpackage.StaffCinema
public class StaffCinema extends View
Staff cinema view Allows modification of cinema and cinplex stored in data file Staff must be logged in to use this class
Since:
05-11-2022
Author:
Ng Tze Kean
